message.body: Yo! Did Tabitha take care of you/get in touch with you yet? Did you have to do much? Lmk! Thanks again for doing that! Such a big help. And I was serious
abt the artist assistance thing. Even if it's just an excuse to hang.
Hey. Tabitha gave me some cash. I didn't get called so I didn't have to do anything
Perfect. Thanks! She gave you 50, right?
It's definitely more of a "piece of mind" type of deal

I'm framing work right now. I might be framing some more or making more frame-stock and frames real soon if u wanna learn to do that. I'm sober and smoke free again so I've not been hanging out at all. But I've been in the studio like crazy so it's pretty awesome to be back to making art
nd monday. I've also been trying to keep a more normal schedule so I can be over on the earlier side these days. I'll txt you whn I see my wrk schedule a
Hell yeah. And yes I would like to learn. And I figured you were sober which way I mentioned assistance by way of hang. I'm wrk ing all week til Sunday a
nd lyk. But might be done to come over on Sunday or mon. Thx again, dude.
